name: inhibitory
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
medical, biology
  specialized with the effect or function of inhibiting (= stopping or slowing down) a process: inhibitory neurons an inhibitory effect on mould growth
formal with the effect of preventing someone from doing something because they feel nervous or embarrassed: the part of the brain associated with judgment and inhibitory control
